member.name: T:quotable.console.Program
member.summary: Homework three Creates a database with all of the quotes and respective authors that allows them to be retrieved.

member.name: M:quotable.console.Program.PopulateDatabase(quotable.core.QuotableContext)
member.summary: Main class the runs both parts of the program. The SimpleRandomQuoteProvider is run first after the long value is typed into the console. Afterwards, an IEnumerable reads the quotes.txt file, and the DefaultRandomQuoteGenerator is run.
